grants.name: First Nations Arts Program
grants.description: Supporting First Nations artists and cultural practitioners to create, present and distribute their work.

eligibility.reasoning: Strong match with First Nations focus and arts/culture alignment

grants.name: Documentary Producer Grant
grants.description: Development and production funding for documentary projects that reflect Australian stories.

eligibility.reasoning: Perfect match for documentary film production with Australian stories focus

grants.name: Youth Arts Development
grants.description: Supporting youth arts initiatives and community engagement projects.

eligibility.reasoning: Good community and social impact focus, may need youth organization auspice

grants.name: Indigenous Documentary Fund
grants.description: Funding for documentary projects that tell Indigenous Australian stories.

eligibility.reasoning: Excellent match for Indigenous documentary storytelling

grants.name: Regional Arts Fund
grants.funder: Department of Infrastructure, Transport, Regional Development and Communications
grants.description: Supporting arts and cultural activities in regional and remote Australia.

eligibility.reasoning: Regional focus with arts/culture alignment, may need regional organization partnership

grants.name: Community Impact Documentary
grants.description: Funding for documentary films that create positive social change in Australian communities.

eligibility.reasoning: Strong documentary focus with community impact and Australian stories

grants.name: Indigenous Cultural Heritage
grants.description: Preserving and promoting Indigenous cultural heritage through creative projects.

eligibility.reasoning: Strong Indigenous cultural focus with community engagement

grants.name: Theatre Production Grant
grants.description: Supporting professional theatre productions and performances.

eligibility.reasoning: Theatre focus not aligned with film/documentary production
